title: "You know, if you treat people right, you can only hope that they treat you right"
body:
https://vimeo.com/151213945

Credit: [**StoryCorps/Julio Diaz**](https://storycorps.org/listen/julio-diaz/)
______
This is something I posted on the NA Boards about a month ago, but I figure I'd share the video because it resonates in understanding that there are always different approaches to problems. By understanding that there are different approaches to problems, and furthermore understanding what those approaches may be, hopefully you'll be able to choose the more positive of the approaches and create a more positive environment for both you and the players around you. If you encountering someone being toxic, try taking the higher ground. 

###### [**Reposted from NA**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/oL1NVLAR-you-know-you-treat-people-right-you-can-only-hope-that-they-treat-you-right)

replies.body: This is really cool, if only everyone acted like this on league the community would be much better. Thanks for showing me the video
